DESCRIPTION:
WARNING: This cog is only meant as an example. Please unload it if your bot is in the Red-DiscordBot server. You can't turn it off per-server, so it gets pretty annoying :P

This cog demonstrates:
 1. on_message listeners
 2. non-json file reading/writing
 3. simple aiohttp example
NAME: simple example cog for on_message listeners/triggers
